languages.text: {n}Руки скульптора ползают по камню, словно огромные железные пауки. Невидящий взгляд странным образом схватывает именно те черты вашей внешности, которыми вы гордитесь больше всего.{/n} "Ваша судьба скоро будет готова, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ее доставят на ваш звездный корабль".

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."
languages.original_text: {n}Руки скульптора ползают по камню, словно огромные железные пауки. Невидящий взгляд странным образом схватывает именно те черты вашей внешности, которыми вы гордитесь больше всего.{/n} "Ваша судьба скоро будет готова, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ее доставят на ваш звездный корабль".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives the exact details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives the exact details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives the exact parts of you that you like the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your starfaring vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

{n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

languages.text: {n}雕刻师的手在石头上来回翻动，仿佛巨大的金属蜘蛛一般。尽管他早已目不视物，但不知为何，他准确地感知到了你最引以为傲的外表细节。{/n}“您的命运很快就要完成了，大人，我会亲手将它送到您的方舟上。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}雕刻师的手在石头上来回翻动，仿佛巨大的金属蜘蛛一般。尽管他早已目不视物，但不知为何，他准确地感知到了你最引以为傲的外表细节。{/n}“您的命运很快就要完成了，大人，我会亲手将它送到您的方舟上。”

languages.text: {n}Las manos del escultor recorren la superficie de piedra como enormes arañas de metal. De algún modo, sus ojos ciegos perciben con exactitud los detalles de tu apariencia que más te enorgullecen.{/n} «Su destino pronto estará completo, {mf|milord|milady}. Haré que lo suban a su navío celestial».
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las manos del escultor recorren la superficie de piedra como enormes arañas de metal. De algún modo, sus ojos ciegos perciben con exactitud los detalles de tu apariencia que más te enorgullecen.{/n} «Su destino pronto estará completo, {mf|milord|milady}. Haré que lo suban a su navío celestial».

languages.text: {n}Heykeltıraşın elleri, devasa metal örümcekler gibi taşın üzerinde geziniyor. Kör bakışları bir şekilde tam da görünüşünle en çok gurur duyduğun ayrıntılarını algılıyor.{/n} "Kaderiniz yakında tamamlanacak {mf|lordum|leydim}. Semavi geminize teslim ettireceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heykeltıraşın elleri, devasa metal örümcekler gibi taşın üzerinde geziniyor. Kör bakışları bir şekilde tam da görünüşünle en çok gurur duyduğun ayrıntılarını algılıyor.{/n} "Kaderiniz yakında tamamlanacak {mf|lordum|leydim}. Semavi geminize teslim ettireceğim."

languages.text: {n}彫刻家の手は巨大な金属の蜘蛛のように石の上を走る。どういうわけか、彼の盲目の視線は、あなたが最も自信を持つ容姿の詳細を正確に知覚する。{/n}「あなたの運命は間もなく完了しますよ、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなたの船に彫刻を運んでおきますね」
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}彫刻家の手は巨大な金属の蜘蛛のように石の上を走る。どういうわけか、彼の盲目の視線は、あなたが最も自信を持つ容姿の詳細を正確に知覚する。{/n}「あなたの運命は間もなく完了しますよ、天の{mf|君|姫}。あなたの船に彫刻を運んでおきますね」

languages.text: {n}Les mains du sculpteur courent sur la pierre comme de gigantesques araignées de métal. D'une manière ou d'une autre, son regard aveugle perçoit avec exactitude les détails de votre apparence dont vous êtes {mf|le|la} plus {mf|fier|fière}.{/n} « Votre destinée sera bientôt terminée, Votre Seigneurie. Je la ferai livrer à votre vaisseau céleste. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains du sculpteur courent sur la pierre comme de gigantesques araignées de métal. D'une manière ou d'une autre, son regard aveugle perçoit avec exactitude les détails de votre apparence dont vous êtes {mf|le|la} plus {mf|fier|fière}.{/n} « Votre destinée sera bientôt terminée, Votre Seigneurie. Je la ferai livrer à votre vaisseau céleste. »

languages.text: {n}Die Hände des Skulpteurs huschen über den Stein wie riesige metallene Spinnen. Irgendwie nehmen seine blinden Augen genau die Details deines Aussehens wahr, die dir am besten gefallen.{/n} "Euer Schicksal wird bald vollendet sein, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Ich lasse es auf Euer himmlisches Schiff liefern."
languages.original_text: {n}The sculptor's hands scuttle over the stone like huge metal spiders. Somehow, his sightless gaze perceives exactly those details of your appearance that you are proud of the most.{/n} "Your destiny will soon be complete, my {mf|lord|lady}. I will have it delivered to your celestial vessel."
